hero_main1: Plan, design and order greenspaces inside, outside and on top of buildings
section2_bottom1: At SquareRoot we believe sustainable cities are
section2_bottom2: . With lots of green spaces inside, outside and top of buildings.
section3_top1: We want to make it easier to
section3_bottom:
Together with NIBIO, biologists, landscape architects and plant nurseries we 
 have developed plant lists for urban greening and standard concepts, such as 
 roof gardens and rain beds, to manage heavy rainfall and to increase biodiversity.
section4_item1_desc1: Optimise your roof surface with one of our
section4_item1_desc2: concepts. Our plants and hardware are chosen and designed to meet your specific needs.
section4_item2_desc2: are carefully chosen with plants for the wet-zone, able to stand up to 48 hours in the water and drought tolerant plants at the borders, the dry-zone.
section4_item3_desc: Our partner Leaf has extensive expertise with
section4_item3_desc2: plants. Incredible aesthetics are combined with minimal maintenance.
section5_p1: By integrating nature in your project, it helps meet the requirements for stormwater management and using local plants increases
section5_p3: Building projects with a high environmental footprint increases the value of your property and
section6_bottom1: Our digital platform makes finding and sourcing plants
section6_bottom2: Through our network of local plant nurseries, we help you find the right plants for the right spot and show what is available to have it delivered in time.
section6_bottom3: Coming fall 2021. Stay updated by subscribing to our newsletter.
who_p1: Looking for plants to create amazing and resilient urban green areas? Unsure about compliance and availability of these plants? SquareRoot is there to solve this for you!
who_p2: Here you can choose a project type, pick a look for your space, decide the functionality focus and customize the plant list we suggest for you. We make sure the plants fit your requirements and will be available.
who_p3: Together we will green our cities!
who_worker1_desc1: started his career in international business development for large energy companies focusing on climate mitigation, environmental policies and investment in low carbon emitting technologies.
who_worker1_desc2: He started his own company Greenbeat to develop a smart blue-green roof combining automated management of urban vegetation and intelligent control of water reservoirs. This project called RainBrain has received funding from OrganiCity and SynchroniCity, both under the H2020 umbrella.
who_worker1_desc3: He lives in Oslo, Norway with his wife and daughter, enjoys hiking in local nature and is a happy member of the swimrun community.
who_worker2_desc1: A lover of nature and the outdoors,
who_worker2_desc2: is passionate about the environment and contributing to solving climate change.
who_worker2_desc3: He co-founded BiomimicryNorway, an NGO dedicated to educating people and companies about sustainable innovation inspired by nature. He has spent a great deal of energy helping various startups and initiatives in the past years using his many skills ranging from design to business modelling for Circular Economy.
who_worker2_desc4: Amongst other things he has contributed building for Gruten the first norwegian urban farm growing mushrooms on coffee grounds. He is also involved with Pådriv on projects related to sustainable urban development.
partner_p1: We want to collaborate with all stakeholders in the planning and design of urban green areas. This is so that we can make the work process seamless so that you can create and maintain resilient greenspaces.
partner_RED_desc: See the concepts that will green you building

partner_LENT_desc: Order the right plant for the right spot on our platform
partner_PN_desc: Show and sell your plants on our platform
